entry.source: This demon has learned all the skills{F801}that it can learn. It is ready to pass{F801}on a {F804,5}whispered skill.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}A whispered skill is a skill the demon{F801}knows that can be taught to {F843,0}.{F801}{F802}If the demon whispers a skill {F843,0}{F801}already knows, that skill will be{F801}strengthened a bit.{F801}{F802}A demon can whisper a skill only once.{F801}{F802}

entry.source: When {F843,0} gains levels, his stats{F801}can be strengthened.{F801}{F802}Leveling up earns you stat points, which{F801}you can distribute as you see fit. {F804,5}How{F801}you distribute them is up to you.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}There are five stats: {F804,5}St, Dx, Ma,{F801}Ag, and Lu.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}{F804,5}St:{F804,0} This relates to the strength of{F801}your normal attacks and physical skills.{F801}{F802}{F804,5}Dx:{F804,0} This relates to the strength{F801}of physical and gun skills.{F801}{F802}{F804,5}Ma:{F804,0} This relates to the strength of{F801}your magic skills.{F801}{F802}{F804,5}Ag:{F804,0} This relates to the hit rates{F801}of your attacks, your evasion rate,{F801}turn order, and escape success rate.{F801}{F802}{F804,5}Lu:{F804,0} This relates to things such as{F801}critical hit rate and recovery rate{F801}from status ailments.{F801}
entry.target: When {F843,0} gains levels, his stats{F801}can be strengthened.{F801}{F802}Leveling up earns you stat points, which{F801}you can distribute as you see fit. {F804,5}How{F801}you distribute them is up to you.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}There are five stats: {F804,5}St, Dx, Ma,{F801}Ag, and Lu.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}{F804,5}St:{F804,0} This relates to the strength of{F801}your normal attacks and physical skills.{F801}{F802}{F804,5}Dx:{F804,0} This relates to the strength{F801}of physical and gun skills.{F801}{F802}{F804,5}Ma:{F804,0} This relates to the strength of{F801}your magic skills.{F801}{F802}{F804,5}Ag:{F804,0} This relates to the hit rates{F801}of your attacks, your evasion rate,{F801}turn order, and escape success rate.{F801}{F802}{F804,5}Lu:{F804,0} This relates to things such as{F801}critical hit rate and recovery rate{F801}from status ailments.{F801}
